title: cf.tls\_client\_extensions\_sha1\_le
content:
`cf.tls_client_extensions_sha1_le` String

The SHA-1 fingerprint of TLS client extensions, encoded in Base64 using little-endian format.

For the big-endian version of this field, refer to [`cf.tls_client_extensions_sha1`](https://developers.cloudflare.com/ruleset-engine/rules-language/fields/reference/cf.tls_client_extensions_sha1/).
